bill_title: H.R.1005 - 119th Congress (2025-2026): Combating the Lies of Authoritarians in School Systems Act | Congress.gov | Library of Congress
brief_summary: Shown Here: Introduced in House (02/05/2025) Combating the Lies of Authoritarians in School Systems Act or the CLASS Act This bill prohibits public elementary and secondary schools, as a condition of receiving federal elementary and secondary education funds, from accepting funds from or entering into a contract with the Chinese government, the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), or any individual or entity acting on behalf of the Chinese government or the CCP. The bill also requires schools to disclose funding from or contracts with a foreign source to the Department of Education.
